description_text:
How do I connect my Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and Carbon
Fiber Heel Plate to my fanatec wheel on a ps5?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jason Middlebrooks,  Our pedals do not support the Fanatec platform, and therefore they do not support PS5 either.

It says on your website that they do.

On Sun, Dec 28, 2025, 8:56 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jason Middlebrooks,  Could you please provide the link and a screenshot so I can check it for you?
